data.title: bergenPAC
data.text:
Safe and affordable parking is available near bergenPAC. The City Municipal Garage is located on the corner of South Dean Street and East Englewood Avenue. The parking garage is open Mon-Sun 7AM-11PM and can be exited at any time. The fee for parking Mon-Sat 7AM-6PM: $.50 first hour / $1.00 each additional hour till 6PM. Parking is FREE after 6PM weekdays & all day Sunday on the streets and in the garage. Additionally, there are also several metered parking lots located across the street from bergenPAC. Visit our parking and directions page for more information. You may NOT park at the ShopRite parking lot, and if you do so you will likely be towed by the owner.

PLEASE DO NOT PARK ANYWHERE IN THE PALISADES COURT SHOPPING CENTER. YOU WILL BE TOWED. BERGENPAC IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANYTHING THAT HAPPENS IN THIS PARKING LOT. IT IS NOT OUR PROPERTY AND PRIVATELY OWNED.

Yes! As a 501(c)3 non-profit organization with a mission to make the arts accessible to everyone in the community, all or a portion of your donations are tax-deductible as allowed by law.â€‹

Did you know that ticket sales only cover a portion of our operating costs? In order to continue our mission of making the arts accessible to our diverse community, bergenPAC relies on the generosity of our individual, corporate and foundation supporters, which allow us to bring a variety of arts and education programming to Northern New Jersey.

Consider donating online today or contact our development office at (201) 816-8160, extension 1048 for more information! Learn more about how you can help keep the arts alive in your community here.
